descriptions.api:
`f;kanyerest` - Sends a random Kanye West quote
`f;floprestroom [place]` - Searches for restrooms in [place]
`f;floppadefine [search]` - Uses Urban Dictionary to find a definition for [search]
`f;image [search]` - searches Google to find up to 30 images of [search]
descriptions.server:
`f;chmsg [channel-name] [message]` - Sends [message] to channel [channel-name]
`f;newrole [#color] [name]` - Creates a role, named [name] with the color [#color]
`f;lockchannel` - Locks a channel
`f;unlockchannel` - Unlocks a channel
